# Contributing to Gitton

Thank you for your interest in contributing to Gitton!

## How to Contribute

### Reporting Bugs

1. Check existing [issues](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/issues) to avoid duplicates
2. Use the [Bug Report template](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
3. Include version info, OS, and steps to reproduce

### Suggesting Features

1. Check existing [issues](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/issues) and [discussions](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/discussions)
2. Use the [Feature Request template](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)
3. Describe your use case and proposed solution

### Plugin Development

Gitton supports plugins to extend functionality. See the [gitton-plugins](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton-plugins) repository for:
- Plugin development documentation
- Example plugins
- Plugin API reference

## Code of Conduct

Please be respectful and constructive in all interactions. We're all here to make Gitton better!

## Questions?

- Open a [Discussion](https://github.com/gitton-dev/gitton/discussions)
- Visit the [Website](https://jsers.dev/service/gitton)
